name: Super Goal Run
blurb: We aim to make an 8bit football game called Super Goal Run.

rewards.reward: BIG THANK YOU - your support no matter how big or small is gratefully received.
SUPPORTER - Exclusive desktop wallpaper + digital copy of the game soundtrack + your name in the game credits.

EARLY BIRD - Digital download of the game on PC and Mac. DRM Free. Your name in the game credits. ------ Note: If Android stretch goal is achieved it will be included in this reward ( a free .apk file will be distributed ). ----- Unfortunately Due to Apple's rules the iOS version cannot be included in this reward. But we are working on a way to get the game to backers. We have not worked out how quite yet. One option is to make the game free-to-play on iOS and give backers a code to unlock all features.
EARLY BIRD BRONZE - EARLY BIRD + Alpha access + Forum access + Exclusive backer icon on forum.
EARLY BIRD SILVER - EARLY BIRD BRONZE + Exclusive desktop wallpaper + digital copy of the game soundtrack.
EARLY BIRD GOLD - EARLY BIRD SILVER + Second digital copy on ALL platforms.

EARLY BIRD + T-SHIRT - Digital download of the game on PC and Mac. DRM Free. PLUS Exclusive "Super Goal Run" T-Shirt. Your name in the game credits\r\n\r\n***Shipping fees apply to t-shirt based on where you live in the world***
EARLY BIRD DIAMOND - EARLY BIRD GOLD + Exclusive Supporter T-Shirt.***Shipping fees apply to t-shirt based on where you live in the world***

CROWD REWARD: Exclusive Kickstarter \u201cFan\u201d t-shirt via spread shirt. You will also get 1 \u201cFan\u201d space in the match background. Fan does a simple animation. Your name will appear in the credits. Includes EARLY BIRD GOLD. ***Shipping fees apply to t-shirt based on where you live in the world***

DUGOUT REWARD: Exclusive Kickstarter \u201cStaff\u201d t-shirt via spread shirt. You also get 1 \u201cCoaching Staff\u201d in a dugout scene. Dugout scene will be used within the game. ( e.g. during the match. ). Staff does a simple animation with sound effect. Kickstarter backer name pops up and image increases in size when Staff is clicked/tapped on. Includes EARLY BIRD GOLD. NOTE: Kickstarter backer name you choose must not be offensive in any way, an advert or related to a business.***Shipping fees apply to t-shirt based on where you live in the world***

BOARD ROOM REWARD: Exclusive Kickstarter \u201cBoard Member\u201d t-shirt via spread shirt. You get 1 \u201cBoard Member\u201d in a board room scene. Board room scene will be used within the game ( e.g. during contract negotiations ). Board Member does a simple animation with sound effect. Kickstarter backer name pops up and image increases in size when Board Member is clicked/tapped on. Can choose Board Member business type and wealth size. Includes EARLY BIRD GOLD. NOTE: Kickstarter backer name and wealth type you choose must not be offensive in any way, an advert or related to a business.***Shipping fees apply to t-shirt based on where you live in the world***

PRESS ROOM REWARD: Exclusive Kickstarter \u201cPress Member\u201d t-shirt via spread shirt. You get 1 \u201cPress Member\u201d in a press room scene. Press room scene will be used within the game ( e.g. when you are unveiled as a clubs new signing ). Press Member does a simple animation with sound effect. Kickstarter backer name pops up and Press Member image increases in size when clicked/tapped on. Can choose Press Member job type and media outlet name. Includes EARLY BIRD GOLD. NOTE: Kickstarter backer name and media outlet name must not be offensive in any way, an advert or related to a business.***Shipping fees apply to t-shirt based on where you live in the world***

PLAYER REWARD: Exclusive Kickstarter Customised \u201cPlayer\u201d t-shirt with initials and squad number via spread shirt. You get to be a player in the game. Your player will play for one of the teams in the game and feature in matches involving that team. Includes EARLY BIRD GOLD.\r\n***Shipping fees apply to t-shirt based on where you live in the world***
